content:
@everyone New Update Released 

 What’s New: 
 - Toggle Menu Hotkey – you can now change the menu hotkey inside the Settings tab. 
 - Rank Number Fix – rank numbers now correctly change from 1 to 3. 
 - Auto Leaver – automatically leaves the match when the game finishes. 
 - Improved KBM Overlay – cleaner and more accurate keyboard & mouse display. 
 - Improved Controller Overlay – better visuals and input tracking. 
 - Color Page Updates: 
   - Trim Color Changer 
   - Tiers Color Changer 
   - Headlight Color Changer (currently not working) 

 Just download the loader from <#1460222121098739854> 
 - If you experience any crashes, open a ticket in <#1397967636804931616> 

 Experience your game your way.
